query: what is range of volume of distribution and drug clearance of anti-PD1 therapies in humans?
answer: In humans anti-PD-1 monoclonal antibodies show a low systemic clearance of approximately 0.15-0.30L/day (about 2-4mL/kg/h) and a volume of distribution close to plasma volume, ranging from roughly 3 to 5L (40-60mL/kg).

results.title: Optimizing Anti-PD1 Immunotherapy: An Overview of ... - MDPI
results.content: By integrating PK data, clearance biomarkers, and clinical outcomes, the review supports a shift toward more adaptive and personalized use of anti-PD1 therapies aimed at maximizing therapeutic benefit while minimizing adverse effects.
